name: First ShooterTP First lvl
description:
hi there 

I present you my first personnal project (out of gam jam)

it's not for commercial but just for fun to show and remember how much i have learn in one year .

Check the vid for know where i am for now in project

https://www.dropbox.com/s/qz6les4f5hsff1d/shooter%231.mp4?dl=0

Like i said in title i will make only one lvl in this game for now 

I will upload the trello later on devblog if you want to check what i have or want to do

https://trello.com/b/R9wQnFz1/devblog-first-shooter-1st-lvl

I give you the asset i will use for add the aliens it's the next step for now (from kenny asset)

and the shoot they have (need to manage this for each one and a little challenge there the lazer (never done before))

K let you there for now see you later on with the devblog for each step done .

I m done with this Exercice Project some info :

     => around 60/80 hrs

     => a lot of code line

     => asset only for free/donation

Keep in mind it's only 1 years i learn coding in casual mode. Then there is a lot of bug and content who can be polished. In fact this game have no interest only kill boss (alien boss spawn are random so it can be easy or a bit harder give him few try)

See you in one year for other stuff XD (i hope faster)

GameCodeurStudent
